title: The Old Rules Were Dumb Anyway
description: When the pandemic hit, the old rules went out the window. What rules will stay broken when things go back to normal?Subscribe to our weekly newsletter here.

itunes:summary: Going to work, seeing the doctor, playing college sports and drinking on the street: How the world will be different after COVID-19.
